name: CONTACT_INFO_LIST_STRUCTURE
description: Defines a list of contact information entries, each with a unique ContactInfoID, a ContactTypeText, and optional references to individuals (IndividualRef). Each entry may include phone and email details.
prompt: Verify that each <ContactInfo> in <ContactInfoList> contains a unique <ContactInfoID>, a <ContactTypeText>, and optionally an <IndividualRef>, <Phone>, and <EmailAddress> with their respective child elements.
